title: Arrays and List Processing
concept: This level builds understanding of arrays (lists) and element-wise operations: indices, neighbors, maxima, counts and uniqueness. Problems are adapted from Snakify list tasks.

challenges.title: Even Index Elements
challenges.description: Given N and a list of N integers, print all elements with even indices (0, 2, 4, ...) in order.
challenges.inputDescription: Integer N followed by N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Elements at even indices separated by spaces.

challenges.title: Even Elements Only
challenges.description: Given N and a list of N integers, print all elements that are even numbers.
challenges.inputDescription: Integer N followed by N integers.

challenges.title: Greater Than Previous
challenges.description: Given N and N integers, print all elements that are greater than the previous element.
challenges.inputDescription: Integer N followed by N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Elements greater than their previous, separated by spaces.

challenges.title: First Same Sign Pair
challenges.description: Given N and N integers, find the first pair of adjacent elements with the same sign (both positive or both negative) and print them. If no such pair exists, print nothing.
challenges.inputDescription: Integer N followed by N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Two integers: the first adjacent pair with same sign, or empty output.

challenges.title: Greater Than Both Neighbours
challenges.description: Given N and N integers, count how many elements are greater than both of their neighbours. The first and last elements are not considered.
challenges.inputDescription: Integer N followed by N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: count of such elements.

challenges.title: Max Element and Index
challenges.description: Given N and an array of N integers, print the maximum value and then its index. If there are several equal maximum elements, print the index of the first one.
challenges.inputDescription: Integer N followed by N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Two integers: max value and index (0-based).

challenges.title: Distinct Count in Sorted List
challenges.description: Given N and a non-decreasing sequence of N integers, determine the number of distinct elements.
challenges.inputDescription: Integer N followed by N integers in non-decreasing order.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: number of distinct values.

challenges.title: Swap Min and Max
challenges.description: Given N and a list of N unique integers, swap the minimal and maximal elements and print the resulting list.
challenges.inputDescription: Integer N followed by N distinct integers.
challenges.outputDescription: N integers after swapping min and max.

challenges.title: Equal Pairs
challenges.description: Given N and N integers, count how many unordered pairs of elements are equal. Each pair of equal values is counted exactly once.
challenges.inputDescription: Integer N followed by N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: number of equal pairs.

challenges.title: Elements That Appear Once
challenges.description: Given N and N integers, print elements that appear exactly once in the list, in the order they appear.
challenges.inputDescription: Integer N followed by N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Elements with frequency 1 separated by spaces.
